SCTX:
Begin bladefixScript

short todayday
short daysPassed

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( bladefix == 0 )
	return
endif

if ( bladefix == 2 )
	return
endif

if ( todayday == Day )
	return
endif

set todayday to Day
set dayspassed to ( dayspassed + 1 )

if ( bladefix == 1 )
	if ( dayspassed >= 2 )
		set bladefix to 2
	endif
endif




End bladefixScript
